control_attributes.Control: AC-4 (21) PHYSICAL / LOGICAL SEPARATION OF INFORMATION FLOWS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system separates information flows logically or physically using [Assignment: organization-defined mechanisms and/or techniques] to accomplish [Assignment: organization-defined required separations by types of information].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system purges/wipes information from [Assignment: organization-defined mobile devices] based on [Assignment: organization-defined purging/wiping requirements/techniques] after [Assignment: organization-defined number] consecutive, unsuccessful device logon attempts.

Control Statement: The information system separates information flows logically or physically using [Assignment: organization-defined mechanisms and/or techniques] to accomplish [Assignment: organization-defined required separations by types of information].
Control Name: AC-4 (21) PHYSICAL / LOGICAL SEPARATION OF INFORMATION FLOWS
